channel.title: Oracle Unified Directory on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Oracle Unified Directory on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes

item.title: Patch and Upgrade
item.description: In this section you learn how to upgrade OUD from a previous version. Follow the section relevant to the version you are upgrading from. Upgrading to July 24 (24.3.1) from April 23 (23.2.1) or later Upgrading to July 24 (24.3.1) from October 22 (22.4.1) or January 23 (23.1.1) Upgrading to July 24 (24.3.1) from July 22 (22.3.1) Upgrading to July 24 (24.3.1) from releases prior to July 22 (22.3.1) Upgrading Elasticsearch and Kibana Note: If on July 22 (22.
